Title: Tile-based upscale (512 tiles)
Acceptance Criteria: Upscales 12MP→24MP without OOM; visual seams: none; time<2.5s on M1; param tileSize respected.

Title: Sharpen-after-upscale (USM)
Acceptance Criteria: Radius/amount/threshold slider; no haloing at threshold>=3; compare before/after hold.

Title: Denoise pre-pass (median)
Acceptance Criteria: Radius 1–2; preserves edges > 3px; no color shifts > 1/255.

Title: Adaptive JPEG by SSIM target
column9: 0.95]; SSIM computed at 512px downscale; output < baseline size in 90% images.

Title: WebP thumbnail export
Acceptance Criteria: Generate 512w webp q=0.8; bytes < jpeg(0.8) in 80% cases.

Title: EXIF orient + default strip
Acceptance Criteria: All rotated assets drawn upright; output has no EXIF blocks.

Title: Glare/highlight recovery slider
Acceptance Criteria: Tone curve reduces clipped regions by ≥15% without gray cast.

Title: Edge-protected clarity (local contrast)
Acceptance Criteria: Clarity radius 8–32; edges preserved; no halos >2px.

Title: Vignette correction/intensity
Acceptance Criteria: Radial gain map; L2 color error < 2/255 at center.

Title: Interactive recenter inertia/bounce
Acceptance Criteria: Drag + inertial settle <500ms; clamped to image bounds.

Title: Auto-straighten (Hough fallback)
Acceptance Criteria: Detect horizon; rotate <±5°; residual tilt <0.5° in tests.

Title: Batch tight/loose best-of-3
Acceptance Criteria: Tenengrad/entropy score ranks top crop; export all 3 variants.

Title: On-device pet detector (tflite)
Acceptance Criteria: Locate pet bbox >0.6 IoU vs GT on gold set.

Title: Ignore human faces unless tagged
Acceptance Criteria: Human faces masked from framing unless "owner" tag present.

Title: Motion blur scoring
Acceptance Criteria: Reject frames with variance of Laplacian < T.

Title: Frame budget logger
Acceptance Criteria: Dropped frame count overlay on dev builds.

Title: RN fast-image integration
Acceptance Criteria: Cache hits improve first paint by >30%.

Title: Keep-alive cache last 8 assets
Acceptance Criteria: LRU retains last 8 canvases/blobs; memory cap respected.

Title: Press-and-hold Before/After
Acceptance Criteria: Hold overlay toggles original vs edited <16ms swap.

Title: Animated trio chips (tight/med/loose)
Acceptance Criteria: Chips ripple + change crop preset instantly.

Title: Export confetti gradient
Acceptance Criteria: Confetti togglable; CPU cost <3ms/frame on mid devices.

Title: Undo toast with countdown+scrub
Acceptance Criteria: Scrub to previous state within 5s window.

Title: Dynamic type ramp
Acceptance Criteria: All labels respect system font size.

Title: Slow-device emulation
Acceptance Criteria: Budget overlay verified on Moto G profile.

Title: LRU disk cache + purge
Acceptance Criteria: Evicts by recency/size; UI meter updates.

Title: On-device-only mode
Acceptance Criteria: All network toggled off; warning badge.

Title: PII-free metrics
Acceptance Criteria: Only event+device class; no user IDs.
